thag6.11:1.2: while dwelling in a forest grove,
thag6.11:1.3: you’ve entered a tough place for gathering alms—
thag6.11:1.4: how will you get by, monk?”
thag6.11:5.1: Those defilements that were found in me,
thag6.11:5.3: are all cut off without remainder,
thag6.11:6.1: The five aggregates are fully understood,
thag6.11:6.2: they remain, but their root is cut.
thag6.11:6.3: I have reached the ending of suffering,
thag6.11:6.4: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
